title: Screenshot of Sitefinity 4 Analytics
content:
Gabe just twittered a SF4 analytics screenshot

[![Analytics](https://cdn.cloudfiles.mosso.com/c54112/x2_12b232c)](https://tweetphoto.com/19604268)

### Update:

Gabe tweeted a link to a demo of the Analytics module [here](https://www.sitefinity.com/blogs/gabesumner/posts/10-04-24/sitefinity_web_analytics_ndash_downloadable_preview.aspx).  Ok, so now what it does is just poll one of your existing google analytics accounts to show the data all silverlightified.  So just follow the directions to make a dummy project (no need to attach it to your CTP instance).  As of right now it's just a showcase and doesn't have even 1/2 of the GA data.
seoDescription: Here what the Sitefinity 4.0 Analytics screen looks like
